about_the_game:
Commanders, in this epic background music of Reshaping Mars, open up territory on Mars!

Hello, I'm Tholus, the developer of Reshaping Mars. I'm glad to bring you its soundtrack.

There are 5 tracks for a total of 27 minutes. I personally arrange and create each track. I would like to thank my wife, Wang Yihui, for her support. In addition, I would also like to thank all our four cats in my family. They can always fall asleep to the sound of rumbling music, which gives me great encouragement.
